Class Navigation

  • java.lang.Object
    • Navigation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LineFollower, ProportionalLineFollower

    public class Navigation
extends java.lang.Object
    Navigation with two motors connected in a NXT brick. In the LEGO Mindstorms environment is represented by the green block "Move".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte MAX_TURNING
      The maximum navigation turning.
      static byte MIN_TURNING
      The minimum navigation turning.
      static byte TURNING
      The default turning of the navigation.
